title: Mecha Zero Sion bug
body: Although I don't have a picture of it, sometimes standing on a Rek'sai tunnel in your passive form makes him grey and his hammer appears out of nowhere

replies.body:
Hey Zeecreed! 

Nice catch! I was able to repro this with no issues. I'm talking to the team this morning about a fix. :) Thanks for the report!

**EDIT:** Looks like this was a quick fix - you should see this resolved with the next patch. :D
